## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_OUTLINE" property

Emitted when the outline of the entity is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_OUTLINE]: {
        entity: Entity;
        outline: Outline | undefined;
        forPlayer?: Player;
    };
```
